verses.text: If only \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w would|strong="H6862"\w* rend \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heavens \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w come|strong="H3045"\w* \w down|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H7264"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* mountains \w would|strong="H6862"\w* \w quake|strong="H7264"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w as|strong="H6213"\w* fire kindles \w the|strong="H6440"\w* brushwood \w and|strong="H6440"\w* causes \w the|strong="H6440"\w* water \w to|strong="H3381"\w* boil, \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* name \w known|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* enemies, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* tremble \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*!

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* awesome \w works|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* expect, \w You|strong="H6213"\w* came down, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* mountains trembled \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* \w presence|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w From|strong="H2398"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w times|strong="H5769"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H6213"\w* heard, \w no|strong="H6213"\w* ear \w has|strong="H6213"\w* perceived, \w no|strong="H6213"\w* eye \w has|strong="H6213"\w* seen \w any|strong="H6213"\w* God besides \w You|strong="H6213"\w*, \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w acts|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* behalf \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w those|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H6213"\w* wait \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w Him|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* welcome \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* gladly \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H6666"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* remember \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* ways. \w Surely|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* angry, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* sinned. How \w can|strong="H7307"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* saved \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H5771"\w*?

Each \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w become|strong="H7121"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* something unclean, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* righteous acts \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* filthy rags; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* wither \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* leaf, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* carry \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H4127"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wind.

\w No|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* calls \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* name \w or|strong="H3068"\w* strives \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3027"\w* hold \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*. \w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* hidden \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity.

\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* Father; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* clay, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* potter; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

\w Do|strong="H6726"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* angry, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, beyond measure; \w do|strong="H6726"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* remember \w our|strong="H1961"\w* iniquity forever. Oh, look \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* pray; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* all \w Your|strong="H1961"\w* people!

\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* cities \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness. Zion \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wasteland \w and|strong="H1004"\w* Jerusalem \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desolation|strong="H2723"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* holy \w and|strong="H3068"\w* beautiful temple, \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers praised \w You|strong="H5921"\w*, \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* burned \w with|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* dear \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* lies \w in|strong="H5921"\w* ruins.
After all this, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, will You restrain Yourself? Will You keep silent and afflict us beyond measure?
